name: PONGARDO
description:
PONGARDO

Welcome to my PONG game. It is a visual recreation of the old PONG game, with some tricky power ups and with local multiplayer and player vs AI mode. It was made for an school project in 2 weeks,  using c++ and raylib.

Hope you like it!

Credits

Nicolas Ramos Marin

Background by https://enjl.itch.io/
